mapper.select: SELECT i.item_num, i.item_brand, i.item_name, i.item_detail, i.item_date, i.item_price, i.item_photo1, i.item_photo1name, i.item_cate, i.item_status, s.item_sizenum, s.item_size FROM item i LEFT OUTER JOIN item_size s ON i.item_cate = s.item_cate WHERE i.item_num=#{item_num}

SELECT i.item_num, max(purchase_price) as purchase_price, s.item_size FROM purchase_bid pb JOIN item i ON pb.item_num=i.item_num JOIN item_size s ON sb.item_sizenum=s.item_sizenum GROUP BY pb.purchase_price, s.item_size, i.item_num WHERE i.item_num=#{item_num}

SELECT i.item_num, max(sale_price) as sale_price, s.item_size FROM sale_bid sb JOIN item i ON sb.item_num=i.item_num JOIN item_size s ON sb.item_sizenum=s.item_sizenum GROUP BY sb.sale_price, s.item_size, i.item_num WHERE i.item_num=#{item_num}
